name: Blocklings
description:
Lemmings-inspired 2D puzzle platformer, where your characters are used as building blocks to traverse the levels.  

Guide your Blocklings towards the flag by placing them in strategic spots to create a path for next one.  

Test your puzzle skills by collecting all 3 stars in each of the 12 levels.  

Keyboard Controls

Arrow Keys/ WASD - Movement  

Hold Space - Activate Blockling

Hold R - Restart Level

Q/E - Switch Block

ESC - Back/ Open Menu

Xbox Gamepad Controls

Left Joystick/Directional Pad -  Movement

A - Move Up/Jump

Hold X - Activate Blockling 

Hold Y - Restart Level

RB/LB - Switch block

B - Back

Start - Open Menu

Controls are also explained in-game.

All feedback is appreciated.

No save option yet. Progress is deleted when you close the game. 

Credits

Oscar Bagger (@oscarbagger) :  Game Design, Programming and Art

Simon Weber (@simonvwebs) : Music and Sound Design

Blocklings is made in Game Maker Studio.

Exclusive Content 3D foldable blocks

Get your very own blocklings, ready to print and fold into 3D cubes.
